I Specilize In

Website designs and development, Web applications client side and server side applications development

Concepting

Ordinary ideas and general thoughts that occur in the mind, skills and knowledge, alongside my client persona are well represented in designs. These are fundamental building blocks of the concept.

Web Interface Designs

I design websites that are fully displayed on the internet. I pay lots of attentions to the user experience aspects of website development rather than software development. My two most common methods for designing websites are, responsive websites and adaptive design.

Frontend And Backend Development

I write the codes which focuses on the visual elements of a website or app that a user will interact with (the client side). As well as the Back-end Developping which works on the server-side development. With the focus on databases, scripting, and website architecture

Interaction

I focus also on creating engaging interfaces with well thought out behaviors. With good understanding, I can anticipate how my client might interact with the system, I fix problems early, as well as invent new ways of doing things
